Text:
Thank you so much , brother. I am looking so forward to this one...maybe I'll sleep till it's ready...

LOL?
I hope the slaughter continues.  GO BRUINS!  Thanks Nepotu . . . you're the best.

I hope the series goes to 7 games, so we can download more hockey this year!

 GO NEPOTU GO!

...AND THE CROWD GOES WILD!!!

GO NEPOTU GO! GO NEPOTU GO! GO NEPOTU GO! GO NEPOTU GO! GO NEPOTU GO! GO NEPOTU GO! 

Thanks, brother! :)
